beers.name: Goat Lager
beers.description: Bright, easy-drinking, and refreshing. This light lager delivers delicate malt notes, a subtle touch of Saaz hops, and a clean, crisp finish that keeps you coming back for more.

beers.name: Counting Sheep
beers.description: Our flagship Hazy IPA brewed with raw wheat and malted oats giving it a pillowy soft mouthfeel. Heavily hopped with Citra and Mosaic giving this beer a dank, citrusy aroma and flavor.

beers.name: Headbutt
beers.description: Headbutt is an 8.4% Double American IPA built on a strong base of pale malt and loaded with a heavy dose of American hops. Expect bright grapefruit, pine, and grassy aromatics balanced by a sturdy malt body and a crisp, assertive finish. A powerful yet refined IPA for serious hop fans.

beers.name: Beast of Burden
beers.description: Beast of Burden is a nod to the hardworking strength required to craft a traditional Belgian Tripel. This "beast" hides its power behind a sophisticated profile of spicy phenolics and fruity esters. Brewed with premium Pilsner malt and clear candy sugar, it is effervescent, complex, and deceptively smooth. It carries the weight of its high gravity with the grace of a champion workhorse.

beers.name: Grove Refresher - PB&J
beers.description: Grove Refresher is a liquid tribute to the ultimate childhood classic. We've taken a crisp, tart sour base and layered it with creamy roasted peanuts and a massive addition of sweet concord grape puree. At a crushable 4.6%, it's a whimsical, nostalgic journey that balances savory nuttiness with a bright, puckering finish.

beers.name: Better Late Than November
beers.description: Brewed with real roasted pumpkins and a warming blend of cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, and cloves, this spiced ale captures the cozy flavor of late autumn in every sip. Rich malt sweetness and gentle spice come together for a smooth, balanced finish that's worth the wait.

beers.name: Tundra Buck
beers.description: This deep-ruby stout pours with a creamy head and delivers an intoxicating aroma of the season. We've infused the rich, malty base—featuring notes of roasted coffee and dark chocolate—with a thoughtful blend of winter spices: cinnamon, nutmeg, and a hint of bright ginger.

beers.name: Irish Stout
beers.description: Limited tap. A classic Irish Stout brewed with Flaked, Roasted and Malted Barley.

beers.name: West Coast IPA
beers.description: New recipe! West coast style IPA. Hop-forward, crisp, clean.

beers.name: King David
beers.description: Sweet and light, notes of honeysuckle, apple, and pear from Old Stone Cider in Lewisville, PA.

beers.name: Roxbury Russet
beers.description: Single-varietal craft cider made from one of America's oldest, 17th-century heirloom apples. Known for its high sugar content and rich, complex flavor, this cider offers a sweet, well-balanced profile with a distinct, effervescent mouthfeel. From Old Stone Cider in Lewisville, PA.

items.name: Apple Pie Spritz
items.description: Crisp apple pie cider with smooth vanilla vodka and topped with bubbly prosecco. Light, sparkling, and dessert-inspired, but not too sweet—just right.

items.name: Margarita
items.description: Tequila, triple sec, and fresh lime juice, shaken and served over ice. Crisp, tangy, and refreshingly simple.

items.name: Transfusion
items.description: A bright, refreshing blend of vodka, grape juice, a squeeze of fresh lime, cranberry, and a touch of simple syrup, topped with bubbly ginger ale for a crisp, golf-course-classic sipper.

items.name: Old Fashioned
items.description: A timeless blend of whiskey, bitters, sugar, and citrus—smooth, balanced, and perfectly simple.

items.name: Winter Margarita
items.description: A festive fusion, bringing a chilly twist to a sun-drenched classic. We blend crisp silver tequila with the tart embrace of real cranberry puree, and a sparkling splash of lemon-lime soda.

items.name: Smoked Old Fashioned
items.description: An elevated twist on our classic Old Fashioned, infused with real smoke from apple, cherry, or pecan wood.

items.name: Coffee Old Fashioned
items.description: A bold Old Fashioned with bourbon, coffee liqueur, and bitters, gently sweetened and finished with a citrus peel for a velvety, sippable classic.

items.name: The Classics, Pennsylvania Style
items.description: If you have a timeless favorite in mind, our bartenders are ready to craft it to perfection. We honor cocktail traditions using a full range of exceptional, Pennsylvania-made spirits—from crisp vodkas and botanical gins to aged bourbons and smooth rums. Simply request your classic cocktail, and we will mix a masterpiece for you.
